com.emc.atmos.api.request

Class ListVersionsRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.emc.atmos.api.request.Request
      • com.emc.atmos.api.request.ListRequest<ListVersionsRequest>
        • com.emc.atmos.api.request.ListVersionsRequest

  • public class ListVersionsRequest
extends ListRequest<ListVersionsRequest>
    Represents a request to list the versions of an object. Note that version lists are paged by default at 4096 results per page.
